name: Maa
greetingText: Wish you a very successful year and life ahead
wishText: I love you a lot Maa ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are the most favourite child of Nini and I am your most favourite
outroText: Love you and miss you a lot Maa.And one last message
replayText: Never lose hope because with hardships deffinitely comes ease
